title: Camille Needs a Nerf ASAP
body: Camile can tank do damage and cc this is really annoying since she came out everyone has been playing her if she is in my team we would win but if she is not we would loose i want a change

replies.body: She cant 1v1 a yas with a good ult. The thing that makes yas so powerfull is his mobility, if you ult and keep him out of creeps he loses that and has lost his gimmic

Fix your grammar, that is hard to read, and yes she does do a lot of damage in 1v1 duels, you know, what her core design is based on, so yes 1v1 her isn't a good idea, but she is near useless in teamfights because she is so squishy, and if she builds tank to survive a teamfight she doesn't do enough damage to stay relevant.
telling other people to fix grammar, end up using same words twice *Face-Palm*  {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
that is only because of this stupid phones auto correct.
